owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueToken(address).details: Can be only called by governance address

params.token: Token to rescue, use address(0) to rescue KLAY

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Can be only called by SynapseBridge

methods.constructor: Creates a contract to unwrap WKLAY. Sets governance address as the owner. Governance functions are limited to rescuing the locked tokens/KLAY.

rescueToken(address).notice: This contract is not supposed to store any tokens. In the event of any tokens or KLAY sent to this contract, they could be rescued by the governance.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Unwraps WKLAY and transfers it to SynapseBridge
